name: flavourfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is full of flavour: I use a very hot pan and no oil to do my steaks as I think they cook more evenly and flavourfully that way. You want them to be crispy on the outside and flavourfully soft and chewy on the inside.
More examplesFewer examplesWe were served a flavourfully seasoned and beautifully cooked piece of beef.The pizza was flavorfully stacked with peppers, onions, and spicy chicken.The dish was balanced flavourfully between spicy and sweet.
